title: Asymptotic invariants of residually finite just infinite groups
abstract:
Recently, Eduard Schesler and the second author constructed examples of
finitely generated residually finite, hereditarily just infinite groups with
positive first $L^2$-Betti number. In contrast to their result, we show that a
finitely generated residually-$p$ just infinite group has trivial first
$L^2$-Betti number. Moreover, we prove that the normal homology rank gradient
of a finitely generated, residually finite, just infinite group vanishes.
